name: Starter Individual Project
description: The Universe is trillions of years old where galaxies have bounded together, black-holes have grown to galactic sizes,  and all the stars are soon to die. All the universe shall be dark.  Player’s life purpose is to find a young star that gives off sufficient light and heat  for the race of Playatoids. Their home-world star is dying and they need a new star to be able to survive in this treacherous universe.
